articles.title: G-force changes likely cause of Singapore flight injuries, probe finds - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Singapore’s Ministry of Transport says Boeing aircraft experienced 54-metre altitude drop during incident.
articles.content:
Dozens of passengers suffered injuries on a Singapore Airlines flight due to rapid changes in gravitational force and a 54-metre altitude drop, a preliminary investigation has found.
